q.quote: Education comes from within; you get it by struggle and effort and thought.
q.author: Napoleon Hill

q.quote: We are made wise not by the recollection of our past, but by the responsibility for our future.
q.author: George Bernard Shaw

q.quote: When you practice gratefulness, there is a sense of respect toward others.
q.author: Dalai Lama

q.quote: The details are not the details. They make the design.
q.author: Charles Eames

q.quote: Forty is the old age of youth; fifty the youth of old age.
q.author: Victor Hugo

q.quote: The power of imagination makes us infinite.
q.author: John Muir

q.quote: A beautiful woman delights the eye; a wise woman, the understanding; a pure one, the soul.
q.author: Minna Antrim

q.quote: Forgive yourself for your faults and your mistakes and move on.
q.author: Les Brown

q.quote: Love is the silent saying and saying of a single name.
q.author: Mignon McLaughlin

q.quote: Friends show their love in times of trouble, not in happiness.
q.author: Euripides

q.quote: Health is the greatest gift, contentment the greatest wealth, faithfulness the best relationship.
q.author: Euripides

q.quote: Never go to a doctor whose office plants have died.
q.author: Erma Bombeck

q.quote: Behind every great man is a woman rolling her eyes.
q.author: Jim Carrey

q.quote: My best friend is the one who brings out the best in me.
q.author: Henry Ford
